@startuml
skinparam noteFontSize 11
skinparam monochrome true
cli->sut-a: (1) GET http://example.com/abcdef 
note right
GET http://example.com/abcdef HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json


end note
sut-a->a: (2) SQL Query 
note right
SELECT * FROM users
end note
a-->sut-a: (3) SQL Result 
note left
Rows count: 122
end note
sut-a-->cli: (4) 200 
note left
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 0


end note

@enduml
